languages.text: "Ничтожная тварь!" {n}Иремерисс шипит сквозь зубы, заметив вас. Несмотря на сверкающие глаза и обнаженные в оскале зубы, вы отчетливо видите истинную эмоцию друкари на ее лице — {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_DaemonicBreach}страх{/d}.{/n} "Я позабочусь о том, чтобы твоя смерть была медленной!"

"Miserable vermin!" {n}Yremeryss hisses through her teeth upon seeing you. Despite her blazing eyes and her bared teeth, you plainly discern what is in the Drukhari's heart: {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_DaemonicBreach}fear{/d}.{/n} "I will see to it that death comes for you slowly!"
languages.original_text: "Ничтожная тварь!" {n}Иремерисс шипит сквозь зубы, заметив вас. Несмотря на сверкающие глаза и обнаженные в оскале зубы, вы отчетливо видите истинную эмоцию друкари на ее лице — {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_DaemonicBreach}страх{/d}.{/n} "Я позабочусь о том, чтобы твоя смерть была медленной!"

traits.locale_text: "Miserable vermin!" {n}Yremeryss hisses through her teeth upon seeing you. Despite her blazing eyes and her bared teeth, you can plainly see the Drukhari's true emotion: fear.{/n} "I will see to it that your death comes slowly!"
traits.speaker: Yremeriss_unit

traits.locale_text: "Miserable vermin!" {n}Yremeryss hisses through her teeth upon seeing you. Despite her blazing eyes and her bared teeth, you can plainly see the Drukhari's true emotion: fear.{/n} "I will see to it that your death comes slowly!"
traits.speaker: Yremeriss_unit

traits.speaker: Yremeriss_unit

traits.locale_text: "Miserable vermin!" {n}Yremeryss hisses through her teeth upon seeing you. Despite her blazing eyes and her bared teeth, you plainly discern what is in the Drukhari's heart: fear.{/n} "I will see to it that death comes for you slowly!"
traits.speaker: Yremeriss_unit

traits.locale_text: "Miserable vermin!" {n}Yremeryss hisses through her teeth upon seeing you. Despite her blazing eyes and her bared teeth, you plainly discern what is in the Drukhari's heart: {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_DaemonicBreach}fear{/d}.{/n} "I will see to it that death comes for you slowly!"

traits.locale_text: "Miserable vermin!" {n}Yremeryss hisses through her teeth upon seeing you. Despite her blazing eyes and her bared teeth, you plainly discern what is in the Drukhari's heart: {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_DaemonicBreach}fear{/d}.{/n} "I will see to it that death comes for you slowly!"

languages.text: « Misérable vermine ! » {n}Yremeryss grogne et montre les dents en vous remarquant. Mais dans le regard furieux de la Drukhari, vous lisez également autre chose : de la {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_DaemonicBreach}peur{/d}.{/n} « Je m'assurerai de vous octroyer une mort lente ! »
languages.original_text: "Miserable vermin!" {n}Yremeryss hisses through her teeth upon seeing you. Despite her blazing eyes and her bared teeth, you plainly discern what is in the Drukhari's heart: {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_DaemonicBreach}fear{/d}.{/n} "I will see to it that death comes for you slowly!"

traits.locale_text: « Misérable vermine ! » {n}Yremeryss grogne et montre les dents en vous remarquant. Mais dans le regard furieux de la Drukhari, vous lisez également autre chose : de la peur.{/n} « Je m'assurerai de vous octroyer une mort lente ! »
traits.speaker: Yremeriss_unit

languages.text: “你这条该死的蛀虫！”{n}伊芮梅莉斯一看到你，就咬牙切齿地嘶吼起来。尽管她露出尖牙，目光中满是愤怒，但你依然清楚地看到了这位黑暗灵族心中真正的感情——{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_DaemonicBreach}恐惧{/d}。{/n}“我要亲手将你一点点折磨至死！”
languages.original_text: "Miserable vermin!" {n}Yremeryss hisses through her teeth upon seeing you. Despite her blazing eyes and her bared teeth, you plainly discern what is in the Drukhari's heart: {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_DaemonicBreach}fear{/d}.{/n} "I will see to it that death comes for you slowly!"

traits.locale_text: “你这条该死的蛀虫！”{n}伊芮梅莉斯一看到你，就咬牙切齿地嘶吼起来。尽管她露出尖牙，目光中满是愤怒，但你依然清楚地看到了这位黑暗灵族心中真正的感情——恐惧。{/n}“我要亲手将你一点点折磨至死！”
traits.speaker: Yremeriss_unit

languages.text: "Erbärmlicher Abschaum!"{n}, zischt Yremeryss durch zusammengebissene Zähne, als sie dich sieht. Trotz ihrer flammenden Augen und ihrer gefletschten Zähne kannst du deutlich erkennen, was im Herzen der Drukhari liegt: {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_DaemonicBreach}Furcht{/d}.{/n} "Ich sorge dafür, dass der Tod Euch langsam holt!"
languages.original_text: "Miserable vermin!" {n}Yremeryss hisses through her teeth upon seeing you. Despite her blazing eyes and her bared teeth, you plainly discern what is in the Drukhari's heart: {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_DaemonicBreach}fear{/d}.{/n} "I will see to it that death comes for you slowly!"

traits.locale_text: "Erbärmlicher Abschaum!"{n}, zischt Yremeryss durch zusammengebissene Zähne, als sie dich sieht. Trotz ihrer flammenden Augen und ihrer gefletschten Zähne kannst du deutlich erkennen, was im Herzen der Drukhari liegt: Furcht.{/n} "Ich sorge dafür, dass der Tod Euch langsam holt!"
traits.speaker: Yremeriss_unit

languages.text: «¡Miserable sabandija!». {n}Yremeryss produce un silbido con los dientes al verte. A pesar de tener la mirada encendida y mostrar los dientes, puedes asegurar que la Drukhari está claramente {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_DaemonicBreach}atemorizada{/d}.{/n} «¡Me aseguraré de que mueras lentamente!».
languages.original_text: "Miserable vermin!" {n}Yremeryss hisses through her teeth upon seeing you. Despite her blazing eyes and her bared teeth, you plainly discern what is in the Drukhari's heart: {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_DaemonicBreach}fear{/d}.{/n} "I will see to it that death comes for you slowly!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Miserable sabandija!». {n}Yremeryss produce un silbido con los dientes al verte. A pesar de tener la mirada encendida y mostrar los dientes, puedes asegurar que la Drukhari está claramente atemorizada.{/n} «¡Me aseguraré de que mueras lentamente!».
traits.speaker: Yremeriss_unit

languages.text: 「惨めな虫ケラが！」{n}イレメリスは、こちらを見ながら、歯を食いしばって鋭く吐き捨てる。燃え上がるような瞳で歯を剥き出しにしているものの、デュカーリの心の中にある{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_DaemonicBreach}恐怖{/d}が手に取るように分かる。{/n}「じわじわと死を味わわせてくれる！」
languages.original_text: "Miserable vermin!" {n}Yremeryss hisses through her teeth upon seeing you. Despite her blazing eyes and her bared teeth, you plainly discern what is in the Drukhari's heart: {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_DaemonicBreach}fear{/d}.{/n} "I will see to it that death comes for you slowly!"

traits.locale_text: 「惨めな虫ケラが！」{n}イレメリスは、こちらを見ながら、歯を食いしばって鋭く吐き捨てる。燃え上がるような瞳で歯を剥き出しにしているものの、デュカーリの心の中にある{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_DaemonicBreach}恐怖{/d}が手に取るように分かる。{/n}「じわじわと死を味わわせてくれる！」
traits.speaker: Yremeriss_unit

languages.text: "Sefil böcek!" {n}Seni gören Yremeryss, dişlerinin arasından bir tıslama sesi çıkarıyor. Alev alev yanan gözlerine ve tehditkâr dişlerine rağmen gerçekte Drukhari'nin kalbinde {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_DaemonicBreach}korku{/d} yattığını fark ediyorsun.{/n} "Seni yavaşça ölümüne kavuşturacağım!"
languages.original_text: "Miserable vermin!" {n}Yremeryss hisses through her teeth upon seeing you. Despite her blazing eyes and her bared teeth, you plainly discern what is in the Drukhari's heart: {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_DaemonicBreach}fear{/d}.{/n} "I will see to it that death comes for you slowly!"

traits.locale_text: "Sefil haşarat!" {n}Seni gören Yremeryss dişlerinin arasından bir tıslama sesi çıkarıyor. Alev alev yanan gözlerine ve tehditkâr dişlerine rağmen Drukhari'nin kalbinde aslında ne olduğunu net bir şekilde fark ediyorsun: Korku.{/n} "Ölümüne yavaş yavaş kavuşmanı sağlayacağım!"
traits.speaker: Yremeriss_unit
